column2: Did you wake up refreshed after your night of sleep?
column3: Do you recall being awake for more than 10 minutes during the night?
column4: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, what did you do during this time?
column5: Did anything in particular prevent you from sleeping earlier last night?
column6: Did anything in particular prevent you from sleeping better?
column8: How many minutes before bedtime did you stop exposing yourself to blue light? (bright phone, TV, etc)
column9: Is there anything important about or related to your night of sleep that was not covered in any of the questions in this questionnaire? If yes, what?

column4: 0: I stayed in bed trying to sleep
1: I used a smart device (phone, laptop...)
column7: 1: Someone or something else woke me up
